mapper.sql: S_ID, S_NAME, S_PASSWORD, S_UNIT, S_UNITNAME, S_DESCRIPTION, S_SEX, N_SEQUENCE, S_IDENTIFICATION, S_DUTY, S_TEL, S_PHONE, S_EMAIL, S_FAX, S_ST, S_JWT, S_POLICENUM, S_DTEL, N_DISUSE, S_GROUP, S_CATEGORY, S_ASSIGNMENT, N_STATUS, N_NORMAL, D_CREATETIME, D_UPDATETIME, S_REMARKS, S_REMARKSTWO, S_REMARKSTHREE, S_DEVICEID, N_ISDELETE, N_VERSION, S_IP
mapper.select: select p.S_ID S_ID,p.S_NAME S_NAME,u.S_DESCRIPTION S_UNITNAME from T_PERSON p,T_UNIT u where p.S_UNIT=u.S_ID order by p.s_unit desc
select S_ID FROM T_PERSON WHERE S_NAME LIKE #{name} union select S_ID FROM T_PERSON WHERE S_UNITNAME like #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into T_PERSON (S_NAME, S_PASSWORD, S_UNIT, S_UNITNAME, S_DESCRIPTION, S_SEX, N_SEQUENCE, S_IDENTIFICATION, S_DUTY, S_TEL, S_PHONE, S_EMAIL, S_FAX, S_ST, S_JWT, S_POLICENUM, S_DTEL, N_DISUSE, S_GROUP, S_CATEGORY, S_ASSIGNMENT, N_STATUS, N_NORMAL, D_CREATETIME, D_UPDATETIME, S_REMARKS, S_REMARKSTWO, S_REMARKSTHREE, S_DEVICEID, N_ISDELETE, N_VERSION, S_IP, S_PHOTO) values (#{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nSequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sIdentification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sJwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPolicenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nDisuse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sAssignment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sRemarkstwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sRemarksthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nIsdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_PERSON
S_NAME = #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PASSWORD = #{sPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_UNIT = #{sUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_UNITNAME = #{sUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_DESCRIPTION = #{sDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_SEX = #{sSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_SEQUENCE = #{nSequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_IDENTIFICATION = #{sIdentification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_DUTY = #{sDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_TEL = #{sTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PHONE = #{sPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_EMAIL = #{sEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_FAX = #{sFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_ST = #{sSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_JWT = #{sJwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_POLICENUM = #{sPolicenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_DTEL = #{sDtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_DISUSE = #{nDisuse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
S_GROUP = #{sGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_CATEGORY = #{sCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_ASSIGNMENT = #{sAssignment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_STATUS = #{nStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
N_NORMAL = #{nNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
D_CREATETIME = #{dCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
D_UPDATETIME = #{dUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
S_REMARKS = #{sRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_REMARKSTWO = #{sRemarkstwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_REMARKSTHREE = #{sRemarksthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_DEVICEID = #{sDeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_ISDELETE = #{nIsdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
N_VERSION = #{nVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_IP = #{sIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PHOTO = #{sPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where S_ID = #{sId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_PERSON set S_NAME = #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PASSWORD = #{sPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_UNIT = #{sUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_UNITNAME = #{sUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DESCRIPTION = #{sDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_SEX = #{sSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_SEQUENCE = #{nSequence,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_IDENTIFICATION = #{sIdentification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DUTY = #{sDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_TEL = #{sTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PHONE = #{sPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_EMAIL = #{sEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_FAX = #{sFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_ST = #{sSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_JWT = #{sJwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_POLICENUM = #{sPolicenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DTEL = #{sDtel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_DISUSE = #{nDisuse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, S_GROUP = #{sGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_CATEGORY = #{sCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_ASSIGNMENT = #{sAssignment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_STATUS = #{nStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, N_NORMAL = #{nNormal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, D_CREATETIME = #{dCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, D_UPDATETIME = #{dUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, S_REMARKS = #{sRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_REMARKSTWO = #{sRemarkstwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_REMARKSTHREE = #{sRemarksthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_DEVICEID = #{sDeviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_ISDELETE = #{nIsdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, N_VERSION = #{nVersion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_IP = #{sIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PHOTO = #{sPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where S_ID = #{sId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
